plot: A Holocaust documentary about the heroic deeds of a Ukrainian woman, widow, mother of three small children, who, while trying to save her Jewish neighbours, herself fell victim to the Nazis.
title: She Paid the Ultimate Price
plot_es: A Holocaust documentary about the heroic deeds of a Ukrainian woman, widow, mother of three small children, who, while trying to save her Jewish neighbours, herself fell victim to the Nazis.
